person.name: 刘京浩
person.sug: 热爱编程，想和志同道合的人一起提高编程能力。

person.name: 谢瑞恒
person.sug: 想加深技术水平，学习前辈的工作能力与思维方式……之类0.0如果自己能帮上忙就最好了什么的。

person.name: Chen Qi
person.sug: It's my pleasure to know the news.As a real newbie,I'm curious about the group and UI technology.Not only do I think it's related to my major in some way ,but it's a chance.With the passion and interest,I want to join you.There can be many difficulties,and there can be a lot of trouble at the outset because of my little knowledge about it ,but I will try my best to do more study to catch up with it.I would appreciate it if you can take my application into cosiderration.That's all.Thank you.
